randomly select.from sentence: In experiments , we first randomly select 20 % of training data as validation set to tune the hyperparameters .

bias terms.from sentence: All weight matrices are randomly initialized from uniform distribution U ( ?10 ?4 , 10 ?4 ) and all bias terms are set to zero .

dropout keep rate.from sentence: The L 2 regularization coefficient is set to 10 ? 4 and the dropout keep rate is set to 0.2 .

word embeddings.from sentence: The word embeddings are initialized with 300 - dimensional Glove vectors and are fixed during training .

dimension.from sentence: The dimension of LSTM hidden states is set to 150 .

initial learning rate.from sentence: The initial learning rate is 0.01 for the Adam optimizer .

training loss.from sentence: If the training loss does not drop after every three epochs , we decrease the learning rate by half .

batch size.from sentence: The batch size is set as 25 .

out of vocabulary words.from sentence: For the out of vocabulary words we initialize them randomly from uniform distribution U ( ? 0.01 , 0.01 ) .
